item.rel_title: Disparities in Age-Specific Morbidity and Mortality from SARS-CoV-2 in China and the Republic of Korea
item.rel_abs: We analyzed age- and sex-specific morbidity and mortality data from SARS-COV-2 pandemic in China and Republic of Korea (ROK). Data from China exhibit a standard Gaussian distribution with peak morbidity in the 50-59 years cohort, while the ROK data have a bimodal distribution with highest morbidity in the 20-29 years cohort.
item.rel_authors: Dudley, J. P.; Lee, N. T.
